notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: two techniques to convince someone to do what you want
foot-in-the-door technique:
you want something large (car)
you start by asking for something small (bicycle)
other person tends to give large after giving small
door-in-the-face technique:
you want something small (bicycle)
you start by asking for something large (car)
other person will refuse something large
other person will give small after refusing large
